title: Scoping review of Machine Learning in Traditional Agricultural Systems (SAT)
description: Consolidated corpus, standardized variables, queries, and scripts to reproduce the bibliometric triage, co-occurrence networks, MCA, clustering, meta-analysis/meta-regression, and FAIR scoring.

creators.name: Santos, Luiz Diego Vidal
creators.affiliation: Universidade Estadual de Feira de Santana

notes: License to be confirmed by authors; recommended CC-BY-4.0. After publication, add the DOI to the manuscript data availability section.
